meta.job_title: Senior Level Public Health Program Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and schedule project deliverables in close coordination with leadership and project team members.
Provide regular status updates and report key accomplishments to leadership and other stakeholders.
Ensure project compliance with regulatory guidelines and federal records and information management requirements.
Measure, monitor, and analyze project outcomes towards project goals.
Oversee the development of a records and information management disposition plan and the implementation of standard operating procedures for training on HHS records management.
Recommendations for the implementation of transitioning of Health Center COVID-19 Response Programs to commercial distribution.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in public health, emergency management, or program management (MPH preferred)
